snippet: The Original Nine was a group of women who defied the tennis establishment in 1970 and started their own tour.
abstract: Original Nine was a group of women who defied the tennis establishment in 1970 and started their own tour; almost forty years later they are reunited and honored as part of the 40th anniversary of the Family Circle Cup, the longest-running tournament on the women’s tour.
lead_paragraph: The Original Nine was a group of women who defied the tennis establishment in 1970 and started their own tour.

headline.seo: Rebels Who Changed Women’s Tennis Reunite
headline.main: Rebels Who Changed a Sport Reunite
headline.print_headline: Rebels Who Changed a Sport Reunite
